name: Courage & Chaos
description:
<<Caution! - this game severely lacks polish, and should be treated like nothing more than a concept>>

You play as a god of war and chaos in Courage & Chaos. It is in your interest to guide the outnumbered blue army through waves of enemies to victory. The only way to victory is through your powers, use your abilities to incite fear and chaos within the enemy ranks. By sowing chaos, the cowards of the red army will flee.

This game was made for the Brackeys 2021.2 Gamejam

Feedback is greatly appreciated!
